title: cittam eppaDi appaDiyEi
sahitya:
cittam eppaDi appaDiyE sheiguvAi shivanE un


anupallavi

  kattuk-kuTTik-kathai illAmal nI vaittapaDi nAn vAzha vENDi nin


caraNam    kaNNaik-kAkkum imaiyaip-pOl un karuNai ennaik-kAkkumE
kasindurugi anbu sheidAl kavi malar nidam pUkkumE
maNNaik-kAkkum viNNE nAn magizhap-pongum paNNE en
kaNNA kaLai kaNNE nAn eNNI urugum puNNiyanE
